### Basic remote registration (\$250?)

* Abstract
* Oral/poster presentation  
* Paper in peer-reviewed proceedings (or journal special issue)
* Link to zoom access to video conference 
* Proceedings

### In person attendance (\$500?) includes 

* All of above
* 4 coffee breaks 
* 1 x ice breaker
* 2 x lunch
* 1 x conference dinner

### Extra activities

* In person short courses (\$150), include lunch and coffee breaks)
* Excursion (Frank Loyd Wright, \$100)
* (Engineering) Geology excursion (\$250 2 days, including 1 overnight stay in Flagstaff) 
* Golf clinic with Ed (\$150)
